product_name: Big Agnes Rattlesnake SL 1 mtnGLO Tent
long_description: Built-in mtnGLOTM lighting, ample space and a 1-door / 1-vestibule design make this 1-person, 3-season backpacking tent a comfortable, convenient shelter for your adventures in the wilderness.
short_description: Built-in mtnGLOTM lighting, ample space and a 1-door / 1-vestibule design make this 1-person, 3-season backpacking tent a comfortable, convenient shelter for your adventures in the wilderness.
